author: Anton Petrov
description:

Hello and welcome! My name is Anton and in this video, we will talk about a discovery of an inconspicuous looking butterfly that beats animal record for the number of chromosomes
Links:
https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S096098222501098X
#butterfly #chromosome #dna

0:00 Bizarre chromosome discovery 
0:49 What are chromosomes (in case you forgot) 
3:30 Number of chromosomes and species 
5:00 Butterfly with a record number of chromosomes 
5:45 Other records and how they differ 
7:00 How and why this happened? 
8:35 Why this matters and conclusions

Enjoy and please subscribe

Bitcoin/Ethereum to spare? Donate them here to he
title: Butterfly With 229 Chromosome Pairs Breaks Animal Kingdom Record
